name: Movium
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
tide-blessing festivals tied to fishing seasons
diet: cured fish, kelp, sea-salt preserves
local craft: small boats, driftwood carving
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
notes: Population unknown; functions as a regional reagent node
Strategic chokepoint for ritual supply chains; attracts pirate/smuggler attention
